DOC.brief_title: Assessment Potential Interactions Between Methamphetamine Selegiline - 1
DOC.detailed_description: To determine safety selegiline concurrent d-methamphetamine challenge 15mg & 30mg i.v . focus cardiovascular response ( HR , BP ) i.v . methamphetamine challenge . This randomized , single-blind , placebo-controlled , two-arm study design evaluate safety selegiline treatment , compare placebo treatment , concurrent i.v . methamphetamine challenge .
